  • Method Details

    • advanceWeek

      public Main.GameState advanceWeek()
      calling this advances the weeks by one

    • setClubName

      public void setClubName(String playerInput, Club playerClub)
      Player input will be used to set the name of the club
      Parameters:
      playerInput - User inputs their own string
      playerClub - is a Club Class, generated previously

    • getPlayerInt

      public int getPlayerInt(Integer min, Integer max, String prompt)
      getPlayerInt function is used as a general function, where the game asks the user for a number between min and max. This function is used when selecting a player to draft or purchase, or to select a player from the team, or to select items.
      Parameters:
      min - is the minimum index allowed by the system
      max - is the maximum index allowed for the player to select
      prompt - is the prompt relevant to whatever the player is selecting
      Returns:

    • setSeasonLength

      public void setSeasonLength()
      Takes the user input and sets it as the season length

    • initPlayerSetPosition

      public void initPlayerSetPosition(Athlete athlete, Club playerClub)
      initPlayerSetPosition sets the position of the selected athlete on the team. The team is checked via the Club class to see if the position selected by the player is still available
      Parameters:
      athlete - is an Athlete Class object, without the position parameter set
      playerClub - a Club Class object, which is used to check if the input position is still available in the team

    • createAthlete

      public Athlete createAthlete(int curWeek)
      createAthlete() is used to generate a new athlete for the team if the team is not full
      Parameters:
      curWeek - is the current week of the season
      Returns:

    • createItem

      public Item createItem(int curWeek)
      createItem(curWeek) generates a new item each week, with its maximum price increasing proportionately with each week in the season
      Parameters:
      curWeek - is the current week of the season
      Returns:

    • nameAthlete

      public void nameAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      nameAthlete is called to let the player to create a nick name for the athlete. If no input is received, the athletes listed name is the one generated by the game.
      Parameters:
      athlete - is an object of the Athlete Class without the nickname set

    • resetMatches

      public void resetMatches(List<Match> matches, int curWeek)
      This function resets the matches for the following week
      Parameters:
      matches - is the list of matches
      curWeek - is the current week

    • runCurrentState

      public Main.GameState runCurrentState(Main.GameState state, Club playerClub, Market playerMarket, Market itemMarket, Inventory inventory, List<Match> matches)
      Gamestate controls the state of the game
      Parameters:
      state - is from the enum Gamestate set
      playerClub - is an object of the class Club
      playerMarket - is an object of the class Market
      itemMarket - is an object of the class Market
      inventory - is an object of the class Inventory
      Returns:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
